name: WigsCom

scraperResults.Title: What Does It Mean When a Wig Says Heat Resistant?
scraperResults.Summary: Discover the meaning behind what makes a wig heat resistant and learn why heat friendly synthetic wigs are the perfect alternative to human hair wigs.

scraperResults.Title: Love Letters to You
scraperResults.Summary: This Valentine’s season, Wigs.com is sharing “Love Letters to You” to celebrate the connections that uplift us every day.

scraperResults.Title: Rene of Paris Unveils Four New Wigs & Colors for Winter 2026
scraperResults.Summary: Rene of Paris is expanding the Hi-Fashion Collection with new wigs and colors. These new arrivals include chic bobs, beautiful waves, and a butterfly haircut.

scraperResults.Title: Why Isn't My Wig Fitting Right?
scraperResults.Summary: Is your wig not fitting right? Explore the four most common fit issues encountered by wig wearers and learn tips on how to get the perfect fit!

scraperResults.Title: Meet Eileen
scraperResults.Summary: Meet our Wigs.com Ambassador, Eileen. In this heartfelt interview, she opens up about her experience, shares her favorite wigs, and gives helpful advice.

scraperResults.Title: A Beginner's Guide to Wearing Wigs
scraperResults.Summary: Our beginner's guide to wearing wigs includes tips on choosing the right size, understanding the different cap designs, fiber types, and more!
